alert.note: Alert for Bedford (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued January 09 at 5:43PM CST until January 10 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Nashville
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Nashville has issued a Flood Advisory for the following rivers in Tennessee... Wartrace Creek Near Wartrace affecting Bedford County. For the Other Area Rivers...including Wartrace...elevated river levels are forecast. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Monday morning at 600 AM CST. && ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON THROUGH LATE TONIGHT... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Wartrace Creek Near Wartrace. * WHEN...From this afternoon to tomorrow morning. * IMPACTS...At 9.0 feet, Water begins to inundate Winette Ayers Park. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 5:00 PM CST Sunday the stage was 9.9 feet and rising. - Forecast...No forecast is available for this location. - Action stage is 9.0 feet. - Flood stage is 14.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
